# bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv-pubmed-v3-e16

This model is a fine-tuned version of [theojolliffe/bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv-pubmed](https://huggingface.co/theojolliffe/bart-cnn-pubmed-arxiv-pubmed) on an unknown dataset.
